name: FReAssignMaterialInCollectionDataflowNode
doc: Reassign existing material(s) to Outside/Inside faces

OutsideMaterialIdx: Index of the material in the Materials array to assign to the outside faces from the face selection
InsideMaterialIdx: Index of the material in the Materials array to assign to the inside faces from the face selection
bAssignOutsideMaterial: If true, the selected material from the Materials array will be assigned to the outside faces from the face selection
bAssignInsideMaterial: If true, the selected material from the Materials array will be assigned to the inside faces from the face selection
